body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Ronald Evans and the customer's name is Sarah Brown.  The conversation is about Bob's Gym (a Gym ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Tech Solutions. My name is Sarah, and I'll be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, my name is John.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John. Could you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Could you also provide me with your email address so we can keep you updated on your request?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my email address is john.doe@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have an issue with my internet connection. It keeps dropping frequently.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. I'll look into this issue for you right away. Please hold on for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: John, I have noted your issue, and our technical team will get back to you within twenty four hours. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
